title: Chunky leek and potato soup with attitude
ingredients: ['1 knob butter', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '2 leeks, white part only, roughly chopped', '2 medium potatoes, peeled and chopped', '1 pint chicken stock', '1 whole blade mace (the secret ingredient)', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'double cream, to serve', 'chopped chives or watercress, to garnish']
